description: With KÜHL’s innovative venting system and a nine-pocket design, the AMBUSH™ Cargo Men’s Short allows you to stay cool, comfortable, and prepared. This highly functional short is constructed from the lightweight and quick drying ÜberKÜHL® STRETCH fabric so you can stay active longer. Superior sun protection (UPF 50).
name: Kuhl Ambush Cargo Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens
